outputs.output_descr:
1. Collaborative mechanisms among institutions strengthened to ensure efficiency, synergy, complementation especially in handling issues related to integrity, ethics and transparency 
2. Anti Corruption Grassroots groups & networks strengthened and voice channels & mechanisms established  to build a Culture of Patriotism, Integrity, Service Excellence and Good Citizenship in the Public Sector 
3. NACPA commitments  and other Campaigns Against Corruption Monitored and Strengthened

1. Enhanced Medium Plan of the Pillars of Justice Adopted
2. Capacity Assessment & Development of Investigation Systems, Rules and Procedures Conducted
3. Capacity Assessment & Development of Alternative Law Groups and Institutions on Human Rights Based Access to Justice Conducted
